all.description: all - AND logic: all conditions must pass (composite)

any.description: any - OR logic: at least one condition must pass (composite)

fact.description: fact - fact name for atomic condition (e.g., "session.mode", "message.text")

not.description: not - NOT logic: condition must fail (composite)

path.description: path - JSONPath for nested data access (e.g., "$.stage" for contextLast)

value.description: value - comparison value (can be string, number, boolean, or object)
